Ingredients.1: 2 (7.25 ounce) packages macaroni and cheese mix

Ingredients.6: 1 (16 ounce) jar pizza sauce (such as Prego® Traditional Italian Sauce)

Ingredients.7: 1 (4 ounce) package sliced pepperoni, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish.

Directions.2: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 8 minutes. Drain and return pasta to pot. Add butter, milk, and cheese mix to macaroni; stir until evenly mixed.

Directions.3: Stir eggs into macaroni and cheese until incorporated. Add 1 cup mozzarella cheese; stir until just combined.

Directions.4: Spread macaroni and cheese mixture into the prepared baking dish; top with pasta sauce. Sprinkle the remaining 2 cups mozzarella cheese over sauce. Cover the cheese layer with pepperoni and season with oregano.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven until cheese is melted, about 30 minutes.
